text: avarkal um'mitam irutit tirppu nal eppolutu varum enru vinavukirarkal; nir kurum; "atan arivu en iraivanitattil tan irukkiratu atu varum nerattai avanait tavira veru evarum velippatutta iyalatu - atu vanankalilum, pumiyilum perum paluvana campavamaka nikalum; titukuraka atu unkalitam varum; atai murrilum arintu kontavaraka um'maik karutiye avarkal um'maik ketkirarkal; atan arivu niccayamaka allahvitame irukkinratu - eninum manitarkalil perum palor atai ariya mattarkal" enru kuruviraka
